job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Summary
Location: Pasadena CA and Austin TX
As Site Reliability Engineer you will be responsible for ensuring the scalability, availability, and security of a large-scale, globally distributed hybrid cloud infrastructure.
Requirements
BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix System internals
Experience in troubleshooting and performance tuning of large-scale systems
System automation experience
A thorough understanding of how the internet works
Experience in operating, troubleshooting and scaling production systems
Writing code is strongly emphasized
Experience in web application stacks, proxies, load balancers and firewalls
AWS experience is a plus
Benefits
Competitive salary and bonus program in an entrepreneurial environment
Top-notch health, dental, and vision insurance
401k plan with matching contribution
Professional Training
Generous paid time off plan plus paid holidays
Frequent company sponsored lunches, happy hours, fun events, and plenty of snacks and drinks
Casual work environment
Supplyframe is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
